name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lonnie DAWSON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lonnie DAWSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel M. Preminger, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Michelle Goldfarb, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 502
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lonnie DAWSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Daniel M. Preminger, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Michelle Goldfarb, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
